description: A fully featured ski jacket that is super comfortable thanks to Mammut DRYtechnology™. Its elastic material offers freedom of movement and is both waterproof and breathable. The Stoney Hard Shell Jacket is packed with features. The helmet-compatible hood with snow-specific construction is easy to open and detach when needed, even when wearing gloves. A practical wrist pocket lets you store your ski pass and accessories and there's space for your ski goggles in the generously sized internal pocket. The Stoney offers reliable protection in all weathers. The jacket's many details are designed for optimal comfort.
name: Mammut Stoney HS Jacket - Mens
